Craniocervical Craniosacral TMJ - International Course for BATCH 2

Pre-Register

Thursday group will be on November 24, 2022.

The batch 1 seminar for craniocervical and craniosacral therapy is a comprehensive educational program designed for healthcare professionals who are looking to expand their knowledge and skills in this field.

Dec

-

18

Craniocervical Craniosacral TMJ - International Course for BATCH 3

Pre-Register

Thursday group will be on December 18, 2022.

The batch 2 seminar for craniocervical and craniosacral therapy is designed for healthcare professionals who have already completed the batch 1 seminar or have a solid foundation in this field. The seminar focuses on advanced techniques and practices in the diagnosis and treatment of craniocervical and craniosacral disorders.

Craniocervical Craniosacral TMJ - International Course for BATCH 4

Pre-Register

Thursday group will be on January 15, 2023.

The batch 3 seminar for craniocervical and craniosacral therapy is designed for healthcare professionals who have completed the batch 1 and batch 2 seminars or have an advanced level of knowledge and experience in this field.
